data.title: Kim Hunter Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Kim Hunter on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Kim Hunter including Planet of the Apes, Beneath the Planet of the Apes, and â¦
data.text:
Suitable for Framing

Columbo is caught in a case of stolen art and murder with evidence pointing to an innocent woman. Don Ameche, Ross Martin and Kim Hunter guest star.

Trials & Tribulations

Jessica is accused of false testimony and bribery in the death of an escaping murderer, and the man's daughter (Carrie Hamilton) takes Jessica to court.

The Legend

The mother of two infamous outlaw sons, against, great odds, tries to steer her youngest boy into an honest life.
